Since you are manually packaging the license file, please put a comment about this line with the following upstream issue as a reminder to check if the license file is being included in the source distribution in future releases:

https://github.com/ryanfox/sphinx-markdown-tables/issues/27
Thanks. I have added a comment mentioning that the license_file is being manually included in the recipe and also linked to the issue you raised.
